nodes.name: I_MakerOracle

nodes.documentation: @notice Returns the current value as a bytes32.
nodes.name: peek

nodes.documentation: @notice Requires a fresh price and then returns the current value.
nodes.name: read

nodes.documentation: @notice Returns the number of signers per poke.

nodes.documentation: @notice Returns the timetamp of the last update.
nodes.name: age

nodes.documentation: @notice Returns 1 if the signer is authorized, and 0 otherwise.
nodes.name: orcl

nodes.documentation: @notice Returns 1 if the address is authorized to read the oracle price, and 0 otherwise.
nodes.name: bud

nodes.documentation: @notice A mapping from the first byte of an authorized signer's address to the signer.
nodes.name: slot

nodes.documentation: @notice Updates the value of the oracle

nodes.documentation: @notice Authorize an address to read the oracle price.

nodes.documentation: @notice Unauthorize an address so it can no longer read the oracle price.

devdoc.title: I_MakerOracle

age().notice: Returns the timetamp of the last update.

bar().notice: Returns the number of signers per poke.

bud(address).notice: Returns 1 if the address is authorized to read the oracle price, and 0 otherwise.

diss(address).notice: Unauthorize an address so it can no longer read the oracle price.

diss(address[]).notice: Unauthorize addresses so they can no longer read the oracle price.

kiss(address).notice: Authorize an address to read the oracle price.

kiss(address[]).notice: Authorize addresses to read the oracle price.

orcl(address).notice: Returns 1 if the signer is authorized, and 0 otherwise.

peek().notice: Returns the current value as a bytes32.

poke(uint256[],uint256[],uint8[],bytes32.notice: Updates the value of the oracle

read().notice: Requires a fresh price and then returns the current value.

slot(uint8).notice: A mapping from the first byte of an authorized signer's address to the signer.
